show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #64 Alex Johnson "Sheep in the UK"
subtitle: #64 Alex Johnson "Sheep in the UK"
summary:
Our friend Alex Johnson joins us from the other side of the pond to talk about his story and gives us another look at what agriculture is like in the UK. 

Alex on twitter   https://twitter.com/SheepLeepLtd
